About Nami ML

Nami helps large enterprises accelerate subscription revenue. We provide a powerful no-code platform for building, optimizing, and growing subscription-based productions. Our customers trust Nami to help them move faster, optimize the funnel, and outperform revenue targets.

The Role

Weâre looking for a Senior React Native Engineer whoâs deeply experienced with the New Architecture (including TurboModules & Fabric) and is excited about building production-ready SDKs and mobile features that are integrated into apps used by millions.

This is a hands-on, high-impact role working at the intersection of performance, developer experience, and mobile innovation.

Compensation for this position is between $50,000 â $180,000 USD annually, depending on experience and location. This is a contract role with the potential to transition to full-time.

What Youâll Do

  • Lead development of React Native features using the New Architecture (Fabric + TurboModules)
  • Build reusable, high-performance native SDK modules and libraries
  • Integrate with and extend native platforms (iOS/Android) as needed
  • Own and expand our automated mobile test coverage using Detox
  • Help define internal best practices for React Native, component structure, and CI/CD
  • Collaborate directly with product and design to create fast, fluid mobile experiences
  • Stay on top of evolving trends in React Native and native mobile development

What Weâre Looking For

  • 5+ years in React Native development, and specific experience with Â 
    • Deep familiarity with the React Nativeâs New Architecture
    • TurboModules
    • Fabric Renderer
    • Native module development (bridge-free architecture)
  • Experience building production-ready SDKs or libraries
  • Comfortable writing and debugging native code in Swift and Kotlin
  • Proficient with automated testing tools like Detox
  • Clear communicator who thrives in a startup-paced, remote environment
  • Bonus: Familiarity with analytics SDKs, Firebase, Amplitude, or mobile monetization tools

Why Nami

  • Impact mission-critical components used in top-tier products
  • Fully remote team with high ownership and low bureaucracy
  • Collaborate with experienced entrepreneurs and technologists
  • Help shape the next generation of subscription growth tools


Please mention the word **ACCOMMODATIVE** and tag RMzguNjguMTM0LjE5NA== when applying to show you read the job post completely (#RMzguNjguMTM0LjE5NA==). This is a beta feature to avoid spam applicants. Companies can search these words to find applicants that read this and see they're human.
